mapper.select: select no, title, content, writer, writeDate, cnt from(select no, title, content, writer, writeDate, cnt, row_number() over(order by no desc) as rnum from notice) mp where rnum between #{start} and #{end} order by no desc
mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(no),1) from notice
insert into notice(no, writer, title, content) values(#{no}+1, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
